name: Carmen Lamp
description: The Carmen Lamp is an elegant and sculptural piece that will light up your space with its exquisite details. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Handmade. Shagreen/Shell/Agate, bronze-patina brass. All R&Y Augousti vases can support water. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Acclaimed design duo Ria & Yiouri Augousti have established themselves since the 1990's as pioneers of modern-vintage style through their luxurious art-deco inspired collections.
